root: ^If you don't come and get this awful thing, I will make it into compost! I do not care if the creatures would die, I can always create something new, who knows maybe I can create someone who does not give me junk and appreciate me and my spores.  Think about it, you can have your icky metally things and I can have my perfect poisonous plants all for myself.
^I remember you and your creatures being all over fire and using it for literally everything!
^Yeah, I too think it is the lack of arms, however, they are at least a little bit faster than the former one. I think my biggest problem is how bland they look.
